actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-78.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 270 - 149 (Record Vote No: 82).

official_title: A resolution providing additional procedures during the consideration of the joint resolution (H. J. Res. 13) calling for a mutual and verifiable freeze on and reductions in nuclear weapons.

summary.text: Provides procedures with respect to the consideration of H.J. Res. 13 (nuclear weapons freeze and reductions.)

titles.title: A resolution providing additional procedures during the consideration of the joint resolution (H. J. Res. 13) calling for a mutual and verifiable freeze on and reductions in nuclear weapons.
